snippet: Ivan Nova rejuvenated his career during a solid two-month stint with the Pirates at the end of 2016. The pitcher hopes to build on that with Pittsburgh....
lead_paragraph: Ivan Nova rejuvenated his career during a solid two-month stint with the Pirates at the end of 2016. The pitcher hopes to build on that with Pittsburgh.

headline.main: AP Source: Pirates, Ivan Nova Agree to $26M, 3-Year Deal
headline.print_headline: AP Source: Pirates, Ivan Nova Agree to $26M, 3-Year Deal
